sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.adapters

Class EditorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractRegistrable
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Adapter
        • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.adapters.EditorAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener, EditorListener, Registrable

    public class EditorAdapter
extends Adapter
implements EditorListener
    An abstract adapter class for a EditorListener. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener objects.

    Extend this class to create a EditorListener and override the methods for the events of interest.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
    See Also:
    Adapter, EditorListener
